errors.error_description: The instruction to install pip using `python get-pip.py` is incomplete and potentially confusing. It doesn't explain where to get `get-pip.py`, and modern Python installations usually include pip.
correction_candidates: Remove the instruction about installing pip, as it's a standard tool.
Add a link to the official pip installation guide: `https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/installation/`.
Change the command to `curl https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py -o get-pip.py` followed by `python get-pip.py`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the instruction about installing pip, as it's a standard tool.
